name: Memory Mania Challenge
description:
MAY 2, 2020 UPDATE (#2): This game has been upgraded to version 1.2, which resolves a glitch on the Enter Your Initials screen.

It's button pattern pandemonium in Memory Mania Challenge!  Pay attention to the button pattern and try your best to repeat it.  It starts off easy, but things can quickly get out of hand.  Beat the top score and become the new champion!

Memory Mania Challenge is a homebrew pattern memorization game developed in GB Studio for the Game Boy Color.  You can play it here in your browser (including on mobile devices!) or download the .gbc file and load it in your favorite Game Boy Color emulator.

BROWSER CONTROLS

The browser version of Memory Mania Challenge supports a number of different keyboard variations (if you're playing on a mobile device, you should see on-screen buttons instead):

  • D-pad: W/A/S/D or arrow keys
  • A: Left shift, right shift, or alt
  • B: Ctrl or /
